title: Placements

replies.body: You finished in Bronze 5 last season, so a Bronze 5 placement is expected.
I won 5 and lost 5 even though i shouldve won 6 put i did so we lost Bcs i wanted my token so i farmed and didnt help team .-. But anyway i ended in silver 5 and i was in gold 3

You will ALWAYS place below your rank from last year even if you go 10-0, you might be put in the same rank if your lucky.
